name: JANVEST Technologies
overview:
JANVEST Technologies is a U.S.-based network of Angel investors dedicated to the investment, growth and exit of Israel’s most extraordinary seed and pre-seed technology companies. With operations in the heart of Israel’s innovation, Tel Aviv, JANVEST’s team of serial entrepreneurs, experienced managers, successful investors and technology experts focuses on identifying dynamic entrepreneurs and supporting their technological development from start to finish.

Combining our unique investment strategy, value-added partnerships and access to a diverse range of start-ups, JANVEST Technologies is leveling the playing field of financial success.
